summary: This module implements the Python interface to the ANSYS MAPDL model database. It defines constants for supported database types, provides an abstract class that exposes the current state of nodes, elements, and selection sets, and implements operations to initialize, clear, start, stop, load, and save the database through gRPC communication.
business_intent: Enable programmatic access and management of MAPDL simulation data from Python, facilitating automation, integration, and persistence of model information within engineering workflows.
